price: 29. Diggah, isi taama yoysomme mari (koros kinnuk), yeemene maral asaaluk sugen addunyal anqasah.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ajramū kānū mina alladhīna āmanū yaḍḥakūna
